column5: Am trying a new lake this year, out of Nestor Falls Outposts. Usually fish Larus Lake with same outfitters. If anyone has tips/perspectives to share, I'd be really grateful!!
I've been to Larus dozens of times with Nestor.... never to Clear tho... I hear it's pretty good. I just don't wanna go anywhere else other than the Bay Cabin
Our group stays at the Beach cabin, and I can't wait to see the new one! When are you guys usually at Larus?
Just returned from Larus Bay. Wait til' you see the new Beach cabin. You will love it!
